content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #78210 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

It seems this is more related to cargo and the issue should be taken to their attention but the issue reporter has a good point saying that this is something that "does not work anymore".
So is the suggested solution (explicitate the target plattform) enough or maybe we nominate this issue and have the team discuss it?

I'll set it to P-medium for the moment because there is a workaround, but ok to tweak the priority if appropriate
